scripts.beta: npm run push; git push beta master
scripts.beta-2: npm run push; aws s3 sync ~/data/perkinspianostudio/public s3://beta-2.perkinspianostudio.com --delete --exclude '.DS_Store'
scripts.deploy: npm run push; aws s3 sync ~/data/perkinspianostudio/public s3://perkinspianostudio.com --delete --exclude '*/.DS_Store'
